abstract: AT&T announces plans to carry out field trials of 5G, next and faster generation of wireless technology, by year's end; chief strategy officer John Donovan explained company delayed immediately discussing 5G plans in order to assess cloud storage and big data analysis concerns; report comes after March 2015 pep talk to all employees regarding upcoming challenges related to progression of mobile network.
lead_paragraph: The company is using plans for super-high-speed 5G technology and an executive’s poignant life story as a way to assuage worries about its future.

headline.main: AT&T’s Strategy Is One Part Innovation, One Part Inspiration
headline.print_headline: AT&T Hopes Inspiration Will Lead to Innovation

snippet: The company is using plans for super-high-speed 5G technology and an executive’s poignant life story as a way to assuage worries about its future.
